title: Any Video Converter Professional 5.0.8 [ChingLiu]
description:
As a professional video converter, Any Video Converter Professional performs its excellence in video converting and video editing beyond your imagination. Easy-to-use interface, fast converting speed, loaded useful features are all integrated. This video converter helps you to enjoy videos on iPad, iPod, iPhone, PSP, Zune, other portable players and mobile phones never easier than before. 
Now, let's take a tour to learn more about this powerful video converter. Besides editing and converting video files, Any Video Converter Pro also supports burning videos to DVD, AVCHD DVD disc with DVD menu.
New: Support WebM as input and output file format.

Features

Convert video between different formats - Convert all video formats, including MOV, M2TS, OGM, RM, WMV, QT, FLV, MOD, TS, TP, DVR-MS, Divx, etc. to AVI, WMV, MP4, MPEG-1, MPEG-2, FLV, SWF, MKV, 3GP and 3G2 for all portable media players including iPod, iPhone, Zune; mobile phones including Google Nexus One, BlackBerry and Nokia and game consoles including PS3, Xbox360 and Wii. 
Click to know supported output devices.

High-Definition video converter - Served as a high-definition video converter, Any Video Converter allows you to convert AVCHD (*.M2TS, *.MTS, *.TOD), HD MKV, HD H.264/MPEG-4 AVC, HD MPEG-2, HD MPEG Transport Stream (*.TS, *.TP, *.M2T) and other high-definition video formats to standard definition video formats. Besides, high-definition video output formats including AVI, WMV, MP4 and MKV (720P & 1080P) are also available. 

Built-in online video downloader & converter - Any Video Converter can download & convert videos from 100 sites, like Veoh, Vimeo, MTV, Vevo, HowCast, Break, Facebook, Myvideo.de, Liveleak, NicoVideo, etc.
Paste URL links of your favorite online videos to the program, download to your hard drive and convert to the popular video formats for all your mobile devices. Downloading only or downloading & converting in a click are also available. 
The video converter would also allow you to specify quality level to videos by clicking menu Edit > Option > Online Video.

Add "Flatten and add faststart to mp4 files" to enable mp4 streaming.

Clip, crop, rotate or merge to edit videos easily - Despite formats of the videos, you can merge multiple video files into a singe long video.
Help you to clip multiple segments in a video by setting start point and end point as you like. Or trim a section of the video by setting start time and end time.
Crop frame size to remove black bars and retain what you want only. You can either use intuitive drag-and-drop cropping window or set crop area size, left margin and top margin to achieve the goal.
Adjust the brightness, contrast, satuation, rotate or flip your video, add artistic effects like noise or sharpen to make your video different and special.
Prepare a .srt subtitle with your own dialogue and embed it into output video, set encoding, position, size and font for your own subtitle.

Burning video to DVD or AVCHD DVD with DVD menu - Unfold Output Profile to choose Burning to DVD from the list, and then select DVD video NTSC Movie or DVD video PAL Movie according to your TV system. You can customize DVD as you like, such as name your DVD in DVD Menu Tile, browse music file from your local computer for your DVD in Background Music, change your DVD's background image in Background Image, etc. 
The program supports burning video to DVD-RAM, DVD+R, DVD+RW, DVD+R Dual Layer, DVD-R, DVD-RW, DVD-R Dual Layer, random access writes with complete DVD menu.

Easier operation and management - Batch add video files in different folders easily with a folder selection dialog. Batch convert videos to output profile you specified and auto shutdown after encoding is also available.
Embed useful pre-defined options to choose and completely customize frame size, video bitrate, audio bitrate by manually entering a value.

Multilingual user interface - User interface of Any Video Converter Professional covers 20 languages including English, Germany, French, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Spanish, Portuguese and other languages.

System Requirements

OS : 2000*, XP, Vista (32bit & 64bit), Windows 7 (32bit & 64bit)
Processor : 1GHz Intel/AMD processor or above
RAM : 256MB RAM (512MB or above recommended)
Free Hard Disk : 70MB for installation
DVD Driver : DVD+R/RW/-RW Burner
Sound Card : Windows-compatible sound card (recommended)

Languages : covers 20 languages including English, Germany, French, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Spanish, Portuguese and other languages.

Homepage :  <a href="
http://www.anvsoft.com/any-video-converter.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.anvsoft.com/any-video-converter.html</a>
